entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
